profile.summary: Strategic Software Engineer with 10+ years of experience modernizing large-scale platforms for global financial leaders. Expert in frontend platform engineering, micro-frontend architectures, and AI-driven infrastructure.
profile.key_achievement: Architected a hybrid micro-frontend bridge using Module Federation to seamlessly embed Vue 3 components into a legacy .NET/Ember.js monolith.
profile.education: B.S. in Systems Engineering, Universidad del Valle (Honors)

skills_hierarchy.description: Architected the frontend for Morningstar's primary corporate web properties, supporting 2M+ monthly users using NX and Vue 3.
